title: Prime Minister of India - Wikipedia
snippet: Singh resigned as prime minister on 17 May 2014, after Congress' defeat in the 2014 general election. In the general election of 2014, the BJP-led NDA won an absolute majority, winning 336 out of 543 Lok Sabha seats. The BJP became the first party since 1984 to secure a majority in the Lok Sabha. Narendra Modi, then the Chief Minister of Gujarat, was elected prime minister, becoming the first prime minister to have been born in an independent India.

title: Prime Ministers of India - Complete List from 1947 to 2025
snippet: Dr. Manmohan Singh was the Prime Minister of India before Narendra Modi, serving from 2004 to 2014.
